title: Top Bitcoin Stocks To Follow Today – July 3rd
description: IREN, Marathon Digital, Riot Platforms, Cipher Mining, and TeraWulf are the five Bitcoin stocks to watch today, according to MarketBeat’s stock screener tool. Bitcoin stocks are shares of publicly traded companies whose business models or balance sheets are closely tied to Bitcoin—whether through mining operations, crypto exchange services, or holding sizable Bitcoin reserves.
